entry.title: Capacity increases for the Bitcoin system.
entry.summary: In a Bitcoin developer forum, Justus Ranvier suggested putting the transaction in the first output of the generation transaction as an OP_RETURN script. Pieter initially intended to put the transaction in a different location, so it's not a big deal to change it. However, the problem is that there is already deployed mining hardware that imposes constraints on the coinbase outputs.
